intro: Thalestris graminiformis, commonly known as the slender thalestris, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its slender, grass-like appearance with narrow, linear leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in composite inflorescences, typical of the daisy family. It is native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa, where it thrives in sandy or gravelly soils. Thalestris graminiformis is often found in open habitats such as grasslands and rocky outcrops.
